description: This dataset contains information about German companies including attributes such as Company, Period, Revenue, Net Income, Liabilities, Assets, Equity, ROA (%), ROE (%), Debt to Equity, and percentage Debt to Equity.
attrs_desc:
- Company [string]: the name of the company.
- Period [string]: the period for which the financial data is reported.
- Revenue [numeric]: the revenue generated by the company.
- Net Income [numeric]: the net income of the company.
- Liabilities [numeric]: the total liabilities of the company.
- Assets [numeric]: the total assets of the company.
- Equity [numeric]: the equity of the company.
- ROA (%) [string]: the Return on Assets percentage.
- ROE (%) [string]: the Return on Equity percentage.
- Debt to Equity [string]: the ratio of debt to equity.
- percentage Debt to Equity [string]: the percentage of debt to equity ratio.

description: The dataset contains information about employees' productivity and satisfaction in a company. It includes attributes such as Name, Age, Gender, Projects Completed, Productivity (%), Satisfaction Rate (%), Feedback Score, Department, Position, Joining Date, and Salary.
attrs_desc:
- Name [string]: The name of the employee.
- Age [integer]: The age of the employee.
- Gender [string]: The gender of the employee.
- Projects Completed [integer]: The number of projects completed by the employee.
- Productivity (%) [integer]: The productivity percentage of the employee.
- Satisfaction Rate (%) [integer]: The satisfaction rate percentage of the employee.
- Feedback Score [float]: The feedback score of the employee.
- Department [string]: The department in which the employee works.
- Position [string]: The position or role of the employee.
- Joining Date [string]: The date when the employee joined the company.
- Salary [integer]: The salary of the employee.

description: This dataset contains information about employees in a company, including attributes such as satisfaction level, last evaluation score, number of projects, average monthly hours worked, years spent in the company, presence of work accidents, employment status, promotion status in the last 5 years, department, and salary level.
attrs_desc:
- satisfaction_level [numeric]: represents the satisfaction level of employees.
- last_evaluation [numeric]: indicates the last performance evaluation score of employees.
- number_project [numeric]: shows the number of projects employees are working on.
- average_monthly_hours [numeric]: denotes the average number of hours worked per month by employees.
- time_spend_company [numeric]: indicates the number of years employees have spent in the company.
- Work_accident [numeric]: represents whether employees have had a work accident or not.
- left [numeric]: indicates whether employees have left the company (1) or not (0).
- promotion_last_5years [numeric]: shows if employees have been promoted in the last 5 years.
- sales [string]: represents the department in which employees work.
- salary [string]: indicates the salary level of employees.

description: The Titanic dataset contains information about passengers on the Titanic, including details such as PassengerId, Pclass, Name, Sex, Age, SibSp, Parch, Ticket, Fare, Cabin, and Embarked.
attrs_desc:
- PassengerId [int]: The unique identifier for each passenger.
- Pclass [int]: The passenger class (1st, 2nd, or 3rd class).
- Name [str]: The name of the passenger.
- Sex [str]: The gender of the passenger.
- Age [float]: The age of the passenger.
- SibSp [int]: The number of siblings/spouses aboard.
- Parch [int]: The number of parents/children aboard.
- Ticket [str]: The ticket number.
- Fare [float]: The fare paid by the passenger.
- Cabin [str]: The cabin number.
- Embarked [str]: The port of embarkation (C = Cherbourg, Q = Queenstown, S = Southampton).
